**Astro** (Korean: 아스트로; stylized in all caps) is a South Korean boy band formed by Fantagio.[1] The group is composed of four members: MJ, Jinjin, Cha Eun-woo, and Yoon San-ha.[2] Originally a six-piece group, Rocky departed from the group on February 28, 2023,[3] and Moonbin died on April 19, 2023.[4] They debuted on February 23, 2016, with the extended play *Spring Up* and were subsequently named as one of the best new K-pop acts of 2016 by *Billboard*.[5]




## Career[edit]


</fragment>
<fragment>

<fragment>

After their web drama finished airing, the group started the "Meet U" project. As part of the project, Astro traveled through South Korea, covering songs in front of crowds and holding fan meetings. Along with the performances, a KakaoTalk Plus Friends account was set up. Fantagio stated that once the group had gathered 10,000 friends on the app, they would announce their official debut date.[9] The goal was met by December 2015.[10] Their debut showcase, held on January 28, 2016, was sold out in under a minute and far exceeded the original limit of 1,000 attendants.[11][12] There, they also announced their official fan club name, Aroha.


They also appeared in their own reality TV show titled *Astro OK! Ready*, which began airing on January 21, 2016, on MBC every1[13] and concluded on February 18, 2016.[14]



### 2016: Debut with *Spring Up* and rising popularity[edit]

<fragment>
Originally scheduled for March 13,[105] Astro held their annual fan meeting Astro Aroha Festival to commemorate their sixth anniversary on April 9, this time titled 2022 Astro Aroha Festival [Gate 6]. The event was held both online and in person, making it their first fan meeting with a live audience since 2019, prior to the COVID-19 pandemic.[106] During the fan meeting, MJ announced that he would enlist in the military as part of his mandatory military service on May 9, making him the first Astro member to serve.

119. ^ ***a*** ***b*** Ahn Jin-yong (May 31, 2022). 아스트로, 6월 日 단독 콘서트 4만 석 매진 [ASTRO sold out 40,000 seats for their solo concert in Japan in June]. *Munhwa News* (in Korean). Archived from the original on May 31, 2022. Retrieved March 12, 2023 – via Naver.

</fragment>
<fragment>
36. **^** Lee So-dam (May 29, 2017). "꿈을 파는 소년들"..아스트로, 오늘 정오 '베이비'로 컴백 ["Boys who sell dreams"... Astro, comeback with 'Baby' at noon today]. *OSEN* (in Korean). Archived from the original on March 11, 2023. Retrieved March 11, 2023.
37. **^** Kim Soo-kyung (June 9, 2017). 아스트로 '드림 파트 1', 빌보드 차트 6위 쾌거 [Astro's 'Dream Part.01' ranked 6th on the Billboard chart]. *OSEN* (in Korean). Archived from the original on March 11, 2023. Retrieved March 11, 2023.
38. **^** Kim Ha-jin (June 8, 2017). 아스트로, 해외 진출 청신호..'글로벌돌' 잇는다 [Astro, green light for an overseas expansion... Here comes the 'global idol']. *Hankyung News* (in Korean). Archived from the original on March 11, 2023. Retrieved March 11, 2023.
39. **^** Seong Jeong-eun (July 7, 2017). 아스트로, 첫 단독콘서트 프리뷰 공개...차은우 문빈 '6인6색 힌트' [Astro, first solo concert preview released... Cha Eun-woo, Moonbin 'Hint: 6 people, 6 colors']. *Star Today* (in Korean). Archived from the original on March 11, 2023. Retrieved March 11, 2023.

</fragment>
<fragment>
21. **^** Kim Ah-reum (June 24, 2016). '컴백' 아스트로, 여자친구 히트곡 만든 '이기용배' 프로듀서 ['Comeback' Astro, Producer 'Lee Ki-yong-bae' who made GFRIEND's hit song]. *Chosun News* (in Korean). Archived from the original on March 7, 2023. Retrieved March 7, 2023.
22. **^** Jeff Benjamin (July 13, 2016). "ASTRO Earn 2nd Top 10 Entry on World Albums With 'Summer Vibes'". *Billboard*. Archived from the original on August 31, 2016. Retrieved March 8, 2023.
23. **^** "*Summer Vibes* on the Gaon Music Chart". *Gaon Music Chart* (in Korean). Korea Music Content Industry Association. July 30, 2016. Archived from the original on March 7, 2023. Retrieved March 8, 2023.
24. **^** Kwak Kyung-min (July 5, 2016). 아스트로, 신곡 '숨가빠' MV 3일 만에 50만뷰 돌파...'2016년 핫루키' 입증 [Astro, MV to new song 'Breathless' exceeded 500,000 views in 3 days... Proof of 'Hot Rookie of 2016']. *Hankyung News* (in Korean). Archived from the original on March 7, 2023. Retrieved March 8, 2023.

</fragment>
<fragment>
127. **^** Nicole Vassell (April 19, 2023). "Moonbin, member of K-pop band ASTRO, dies at 25". *The Independent*. Archived from the original on April 20, 2023. Retrieved April 19, 2023.
128. **^** Kang Nae-ri (September 27, 2022). 아스트로 공연, 영화로 본다…'스타게이저:아스트로스코프' 10월 개봉 [Watching Astro's performances as a movie... 'Stargazer: Astroscope' to be released in October]. *YTN* (in Korean). Archived from the original on September 28, 2022. Retrieved March 11, 2023 – via Naver.
129. **^** Yoo Byung-cheol (August 6, 2015). 김새론, 웹드라마 '투비컨티뉴드' 출연…판타지오 NEW 보이그룹과 호흡 [Kim Sae-ron appear in the web drama 'To Be Continued'... Working with the new Fantagio boy group]. *WOW TV Star* (in Korean). Archived from the original on March 4, 2023. Retrieved March 5, 2023 – via Naver.

</fragment>
<fragment>
106. **^** Ji Min-kyung (April 9, 2022). 아스트로, 오늘(9일) 데뷔 6주년 기념 팬미팅 'GATE 6' 개최 [Astro to hold fan meeting 'GATE 6' to commemorate the 6th anniversary of their debut today (9th)]. *OSEN* (in Korean). Archived from the original on March 13, 2023. Retrieved March 13, 2023.
107. **^** Ahn Yoon-ji (April 10, 2022). 아스트로 MJ, 5월 9일 군악대 입대 "건강히 돌아올 것"[전문] [Astro's MJ to enlist in the military band on May 9 "I will come back in good health" [Full Text]]. *Daum Star News* (in Korean). Archived from the original on April 9, 2022. Retrieved March 13, 2023.
108. **^** Ji Min-kyung (April 26, 2022). 아스트로, 5월 16일 정규 3집 발매..'청량 아이콘' 컴백 [공식] [Astro, 3rd studio album will be released on May 16... 'Cool Icon' comeback [Official]]. *OSEN* (in Korean). Archived from the original on April 26, 2022. Retrieved March 13, 2023 – via Naver.

</fragment>
<fragment>

On February 28, 2023, it was announced that Rocky had ultimately decided to leave the agency and the group.[3][125] On April 20, Yonhap News reported that Moonbin had died the prior evening,[4] which was later confirmed by Astro's agency Fantagio.[126][127] The circumstances of his death are being investigated by the police.[4]

* Jinjin (진진)
* Cha Eunwoo (차은우)
* Sanha (윤산하)

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
